generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road surface with visible lane markings and a Mercedes-Benz emblem in the foreground, indicating it is a road.
- sidewalk: A paved pedestrian area with curbs and metal railings is visible on the right side of the road, where people are walking and bicycles are parked.
- building: Multiple brick and concrete buildings are visible along both sides of the street, including commercial storefronts and residential structures.
- vegetation: Trees with green and yellow leaves are visible along the sidewalks and in the background, indicating the presence of vegetation.
- person: Several individuals are visible walking on the sidewalk and crossing the road, including a group near the parked cars and others further down the street.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the right side of the road, near the curb, with its rear section visible.
- bicycle: A bicycle is parked on the sidewalk near the curb, secured to a metal rack.
- traffic sign: Several traffic signs are visible, including a "No Parking" sign on the left, a blue "T" sign indicating a parking restriction, and a blue "No Parking" sign on the right.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, including those supporting traffic signs and streetlights.
- car: Several cars are parked along the right side of the road, including a black car and a silver car further down the street.
